content.prompt: Which of the following pieces of evidence could best be used to support Addamsâ€™ argument in the excerpt about politics in the late 1800s?

choices.label: Federal civil service reform led to a reduction in the number of political patronage jobs.
The allegiance of immigrant voters led to the creation of urban political machines.
Many writers gained a large audience with criticisms of corruption in city politics.
African Americans predominantly identified with politicians of the Republican Party.

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
